thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 61 of 625
thread.title: Kim Shaver

author: Kim Shaver
title: Kim Shaver
text: Just placed my second order and couldn't be happier. My first order I had to return an item due to size I had gained some weight but not as much as I had thought. It was a very easy return they supply you with everything you need so it is not a hassle. Also after shopping this weekend and looking at some tops you can't beat the price. If you wear alot of workout gear this is the place to get it.
